# jackatyler.com

## About
Jack Tyler is a data architect and systems integrator based in Oakland, CA with 10+ years of experience. He operates Unified Stack, LLC, offering consulting and contract work in data architecture, analytics pipeline design, and compliance-safe AI deployment.

## Consulting Services
Jack is available for consulting and contract engagements through Unified Stack, LLC:
- Tagging-to-Pipeline: GTM/GA4 audits, tag governance, and end-to-end pipeline from website instrumentation to data warehouse (starting at $2,500 for audit)
- Data Architecture & Integration: Salesforce, Oracle EBS, Snowflake, and martech stack unification with Tableau reporting (starting at $8,000 for assessment)
- Compliance-Safe AI Deployment: AI governance architecture ensuring agents never touch raw data, CPRA/GDPR-compliant inference patterns (starting at $25,000 for assessment)

## Key Expertise
- Salesforce (Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Account Engagement, Flows, Apex)
- Snowflake, Oracle EBS, AWS/S3, SFTP pipelines
- GTM, GA4, conversion tracking, analytics pipeline architecture
- DAM/PIM systems (Widen/Acquia DAM, Syndigo, 1WorldSync)
- Martech integration (Zapier, Klaviyo, Drupal, Magento, WordPress)
- MCP servers, agentic workflows, GPT integrations
- CPRA/CCPA compliance, ADA/WCAG audits
